accessibility._instruction: Add the accessibility of the data for this research product version.

author._instruction: Add one or several authors (person or organization) that contributed to the production and publication of this research product version.

copyright._instruction: Add the copyright information of this research product version.

custodian._instruction: Add one or several custodians (person or organization) that are responsible for this research product version.

description._instruction: Enter a description (abstract) for this research product (max. 2000 characters, incl. spaces; no references).

developer._instruction: Add one or several developers (person or organization) that contributed to the code implementation of this research product version.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product version.

fullDocumentation._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of a full documentation of this research product version.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name (title) for this research product version.

funding._instruction: Add all funding information of this research product version.

homepage._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this research product version.

keyword._instruction: Enter custom keywords to this research product version.

license._instruction: Add the license of this research product version.

otherContribution._instruction: Add the contributions for each involved person or organization going beyond being an author, custodian or developer of this research product version.

relatedPublication._instruction: Add further publications besides the documentation (e.g. an original research article) providing the original context for the production of this research product version.

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date (actual or intended) of the first broadcast/publication of this research product version.

repository._instruction: Add the file repository of this research product version.

shortName._instruction: Enter a short name (alias) for this research product version (max. 30 characters, no space).

supportChannel._instruction: Enter all channels through which a user can receive support for handling this research product.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this research product version.

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short summary of the novelties/peculiarities of this research product version.
